Contaminants
https://www.nj.gov/dep/srp/community/sites/
info:
The state of New Jersey has its own list of known contaminated sites identifying more than 14,100 properties that likely includes the landfill, junkyard, corner gas station or former dry cleaners in your town.

Read More: Polluted New Jersey: The most toxic sites in your neighborhood https://nj1015.com/polluted-new-jersey-the-most-toxic-sites-in-your-neighborhood
